A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What's more infuriating about this movie is that it had the potential of being great with some changes. To name one\, have Luke teach Rey\, and Snoke do the same with Kylo and you could at least have a flawed sith fight a soon-to-be-capable jedi. I mean you could argue that after Rogue One's final awesome scene these people would figure what the audience wants. But hey\, you can always have Luke milking an alien for blue colored milk.
